BR.name: Bloody Vampire
BR.description: Vários anos atrás, um estranho homem chegou às ruínas de um castelo abandonado nos limites de uma pequena cidade chamada Verulia. Desde então, o medo dos habitantes da cidade em relação ao castelo cresceu, e ninguém ousaria se aventurar nele. Recentemente, um mercador viajou para Verulia encontrou uma cidade deserta. Sua história foi enfeitada, à medida que rumores perturbadores de vampiros vivendo no castelo se espalharam rapidamente pela terra. À medida que Latis fica mais velha e aprende mais sobre ela mesma a partir de Cereza, ela sente que é destinada por sua herança a pôr um fim a qualquer ameaça que os vampiros representem a humanidade. Sua concorda-se que ela deve ir com Cereza e viajar para Verulia. Características: Quatro elementos mágicos, possibilidade de três níveis. Transforme-se entre um morcego e um lobo invencível. Lute com inimigos para obter ouro e comprar itens raros. Encontre batalhas e confronte bestas poderosas.

CA.name: Bloody Vampire
CA.description: Several years ago, a strange man made his way to the ruins of an abandoned castle on the outskirts of a small town called Verulia. Since then, the townspeople's fear of the castle has grown, and none would dare venture near it. Recently, a merchant traveled to Verulia and discovered the entire town was deserted. Her story was embellished, as disturbing rumors of a vampire inhabiting the castle spread like wildfire through the land. As Latis has become older and learned more about herself from Cereza, she feels she is destined by her heritage to bring an end to any threat that vampires pose to humanity. It’s agreed that she must go with Cereza and travel to Verulia. Features: Four magic elements, able to increase three levels. Transform between a daring bat and an invincible wolf. Fight enemies to earn gold and buy rare items. Encounter event battles and confront evil beasts.

MX.name: Bloody Vampire
MX.description: Hace años, un hombre extraño entró en las ruinas de un viejo castillo en las afueras de un pueblo llamado Verulia. Desde entonces, el miedo de los habitantes al castillo fue aumentando y nadie se atrevía a acercarse. Recientemente, una comerciante viajó al lugar y descubrió que el pueblo estaba desierto. Su historia fue creciendo y adornándose, mientras que inquietantes rumores de que un vampiro habitaba el castillo empezaron a propagarse como la pólvora por toda la región. Latis, que fue creciendo y aprendiendo más sobre sí misma, sintió que, debido a su herencia, estaba destinada a acabar con la amenaza que los vampiros suponían para la humanidad. Tras una larga discusión, se decidió que Latis debía viajar con Cereza hacia Verulia. Características: Cuatro elementos mágicos, con tres niveles de avance. Transfórmate en audaz murciélago o en lobo invencible. Derrota enemigos, obtén oro y compra objetos raros. Lucha con poderosas bestias en los eventos de combate.

Since then, the townspeople's fear of the castle has grown, and none would dare venture near it. Recently, a merchant traveled to Verulia and discovered the entire town was deserted. Her story was embellished, as disturbing rumors of a vampire inhabiting the castle spread like wildfire through the land. As Latis has become older and learned more about herself from Cereza, she feels she is destined by her heritage to bring an end to any threat that vampires pose to humanity. It’s agreed that she must go with Cereza and travel to Verulia. Features: Four magic elements, able to increase three levels. Transform between a daring bat and an invincible wolf. Fight enemies to earn gold and buy rare items. Encounter event battles and confront evil beasts.
